personalInfo.education: University of Central Florida (1996, Health Science)
personalInfo.splInterest: Fitness, reading, studying the golf swing, spending time with his kids

tourBios.exmtStatus: 25th Nationwide Tour Qualifier at the 2010 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: Has played five Nationwide Tour events between 2001-2002. Best finish was T27 at the 2001 Albertsons Boise Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: All Big 8 honorable mention in 1993. Won the 1992 Cyclone Classic. Three-time runner-up at the state championships in high school. Three-time all-area selection and three-time all-conference in high school.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill outside of golf is the birth of his two daughters and having a family...First car was a 1985 Chevy S15 truck...Favorite TV show is "Entourage," and "Caddyshack" and the "Godfather" trilogy are his favorite movies...Has a particular interest in collecting tennis shoes...Never travels without his phone, computer and pictures of his family...Favorite course is St. Andrews...Rounds out his dream foursome with Ben Hogan, Sam Snead and Tiger Woods...Bucket list includes sky diving, taking his wife to Paris and playing on the PGA TOUR...Has caddied for TOUR members Camilo Villegas, Tom Pernice, Jr. and Ben Crane...Attended Kansas State before transfering to the University of Central Florida..Was a three-time all-state selection in high school as a quarterback and kicker...Charities involved with are Keith Brookings Foster Kids, Love 41 and Embrace Grace, which offers services to adoptive parents and birthmothers.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T27th in 2001 at the BUY.COM Tri-Cities Open.
